adjectives.description: halfhearted (comparative more halfhearted, superlative most halfhearted)

entries.meaning: Lacking full energy, effort, commitment, or resolve.
examples: He made a half-hearted attempt to read the chapter before giving up and dozing off.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Lacking in heart or spirit; ungenerous; unkind.
examples: such animals, Half-hearted creatures, as these are, your fox there
